name: I have no mouth and I must scream
name_original: I have no mouth and I must scream
description:
I have no mouth and I must scream is a game about experiencing pain and loneliness and something changing that pain, while you cannot change your situation. It uses 1d6 and includes prompts for expressing thoughts through writing or otherwise, as well as guidance to draw or take a picture of yourself. 

Please consider using a safety tool like Script Change while playing!

This is a submission to the #PleasureNotBusinessCardJam! #pleasurecardrpg
